price: 13. Dabeeto ka yeellay (ka abuurnaa ilmaha Aadam) dhibic biyo (mani) ah ku sugnaata gunta meel aamin ah (riximka).
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnāhu nuṭ'fatan fī qarārin makīnin
